description: The Great Laxey Wheel was stopped in August 2019 after structural damage was found.
title: Great Laxey Wheel needs 'a little rain' to turn again after reopening
title_page: Great Laxey Wheel needs 'a little rain' to turn again after reopening - BBC News
maintext: MNH's Gaynor Haxby said visitors would be able to climb the Victorian wheel, which was originally used in mining, but work to enable the structure to turn was still ongoing.
